channel.title: Auto cast problem
channel.description:
Hi , i have added auto cast and it works but every time i try to use barrage or multiple hit spells i get this in run.bat
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 at client.attackNPCSWithin(client.java:142) at client.AttackNPC(client.java:29115) at client.process(client.java:17970) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:152) at server.main(server.java:52)
Help please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2009, 11:28:20 pm[/size][hr]any help please?

item.title: Auto cast problem

item.description:
@del_piero1994 wrote:

Hi , i have added auto cast and it works but every time i try to use barrage or multiple hit spells i get this in run.bat
